Description: Cornershop is an on-demand grocery delivery service for the Latin American market.
Full Description: Cornershop is an on-demand grocery delivery service for the Latin American market. Founded simultaneously in Santiago, Chile and Mexico City in 2015, we now operate in 8 countries across the Americas. In July 2020, Uber acquired a majority stake in the company. This provided an important injection of capital and allows us to access more resources to continue building and improving our service over the upcoming years.  Cornershop Mexico was not part of the transaction and will continue to operate independently while we await approval from the Mexican antitrust authorities (COFECE). Besides technology, we like food puns and are berry dedicated to providing people with an on-demand, easy-to-use, and innovative shopping experience. Join us on our mission to deliver free time to everyone with shopping on their to-do list.

Description: LATAM Airlines Group S.A. is the new name given to LAN Airlines S.A
Full Description: LATAM Airlines Group S.A. is the new name given to LAN Airlines S.A. as a result of its association with TAM S.A. LATAM Airlines Group S.A. now includes LAN Airlines and its affiliates in Peru, Argentina, Colombia and Ecuador, and LAN Cargo and its affiliates, as well as TAM S.A. and its subsidiaries TAM Linhas Aereas S.A., including its business units TAM Transportes Aereos del Mercosur S.A., TAM Airlines (Paraguay) and Multiplus S.A. This association creates one of the largest airline groups in the world in terms of network connections, providing passenger transport services to about 150 destinations in 22 countries and cargo services to about 169 destinations in 27 countries, with a fleet of 310 aircraft. In total, LATAM Airlines Group S.A. has more than 51,000 employees and its shares are traded in Santiago, as well as on the New York Stock Exchange, in the form of ADRs, and Sao Paulo Stock Exchange, in the form of BDRs.

Description: Odd builds Odd Vision, a computer vision platform that transforms offline processes into online data without friction.
Full Description: Odd builds Odd Vision, a computer vision platform that leverages cloud and edge deep learning models trained on tens of millions of industrial images, to generate frictionless structured data with a focus on security, privacy and avoiding bias.  Some of the world's largest industries are also the least digitized, with productivity, safety and sustainability issues. Odd focuses on helping these industries become safer, smarter, more sustainable and productive.  Construction companies use Odd Vision to reduce delays and execute within budget, Factories use Odd Vision to understand human-to-machine interaction and optimize output, Cities use Odd Vision to understand foot and vehicle traffic and design better environments, Energy and Utility companies use Odd Vision to control their use of natural resources, Logistics companies and Ports use Odd Vision to optimize their physical space — and all of the above use Odd Vision to ensure the safety and well-being of workers in high-risk environments. Odd Industries was featured in 2019 by the Google AI team as one of the global leaders using machine learning to improve efficiency and sustainability. Our goal is to help improve our world with better information.

Description: Integrating current edTech with our AI based platforms.
Full Description: u-planner is an international technology solutions company for higher education. We seek to improve education by incorporating Data Science concepts such as Big Data and Artificial Intelligence that help optimize and improve the educational system, improving the quality of education that students obtain and their final results.   u-planner’s mission is to empower HEI with innovative technological solutions that allows them to achieve high performance in the execution of their strategic plans. Nowadays, there is a disconnection from what is needed by students, teachers and management.    Today we work in three main product lines which represent some of the biggest needs of HEI, Planning, Assessment and Student Success, in which we can, for example, score students based on their dropout probability with a 95% accuracy. This has represented a huge opportunity, and we are using these and other analytical algorithms to empower education systems with new innovative technology solutions. We have led HEIs to step out of their comfort zone, from outdated Oracle data bases and legacy systems, to analytical business tools, replacing manual processes and intuition, with cutting-edge machine learning algorithms that extract information from raw data; this has allowed institutions to avoid specific investments, leaving the architecture and implementations complexities to the provider as a first approach to a cloud based environment; changing education driving impact and insights for institutions to help students in classrooms of today to create the future of tomorrow.
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence, Data and Analytics, Education, Other, Science and Engineering, Software
Founders: Carolina Arce, Cristián Espinoza, JuanPablo Mena, Rodrigo Hernández, PhD, Wilibaldo Bravo

P46 community serves users in Latin America, connects them with Global merchants through a unique mobile network of agents, providing the easiest way to collect and process cash payments. Collection agents use services provided by Pago46 to collect cash from users and make an additional source of income.

Description: The Live Green Co uses technology to make plant-based foods tastier, healthier, and more sustainable.
Full Description: Driven by millennials, the plant-based foods market is already US$10Bn in size today. And it is projected to be US$25Bn by 2026. Visionaries like Bill Gates, Richard Branson & Leonardo Dicaprio have all invested big. In our pilot market, Chile, Jeff Bezos invested US$30Mn in the Not Co.  But, the existing alternatives still use synthetic additives, highly processed ingredients, and plastic packaging. And, their R&D costs millions of dollars and many years! That is why, at The Live Green Co, we use technology to make plant-based foods tastier, healthier & more sustainable. Our Recommendation Software (Charaka) blends our Ancestral Indian Science of Plant Nutrition and modern Tech, profiles the synthetic, processed & animal additives in our daily food, and recommends 100% natural plant-based Product Formulations... at just a fraction of the R&D cost & time! And, our Proprietary Production Process uses Natural Processing, Frugal Engineering & Circular Economy principles to cut down pollution, and usage of energy, land & water by more than 50%. It is no more about a few people following a sustainable lifestyle perfectly. It is about millions doing it, even if imperfectly.
Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Food and Beverage, Health Care, Science and Engineering, Sustainability

Industries: Intellectual Property, Internet of Things, SaaS
Description: Fracttal is the asset management platform for Internet of Things (IoT).
Full Description: Fracttal is the asset management platform for Internet of Things (Iot). Fracttal is a SaaS cloud-based software that combines all the possibilities of Machine to Machine (M2M) communication and Enterprise Asset Management(EAM). With Fracttal companies of any sector or size can solve their critical asset performance challenges, making the maintenance management and asset control efficient.   It is comprised of 3 components: Fracttal EAM, Fracttal Mobile and Fracttal BoX.   Fracttal EAM is the brain where companies can monitor all aspects of asset management like equipments, providers, technicians, preventive maintenance, rotating assets, spare parts, maintenance costs, budget management, emergencies, and warranties. We present data on all of this through statistics and powerful KPI indicators with multi-worksite support in a fast and user friendly web interface.   Fracttal Mobile is an app for technicians who are constantly working in the field. With their mobile devices they can access maintenance routes, resolve tasks and receive alerts.   Fracttal BoX is an IoT appliance where companies can connect sensors or I/0 devices to monitor their assets in realtime. With this device we can predict failures before they happen and alert operators of disruptions in real-time, saving companies significant costs.   Discover the power and simplicity of Fracttal

Description: PolyNatural is offering Shel-Life to extend the life of fruits.
Full Description: Natural disruptive intelligent science, for the first time available for the fruticulture industry. PolyNatural is engaged in cutting-edge research, innovation, and development. We use the potential of completely natural components to make unique products in the market that benefit the quality of food for people all around the world. “Inspired by the food grown for centuries in South America, we have developed products with 100% natural components that have revolutionized agribusiness and have taken food to the next level. We aim to improve people’s quality of life with a strong commitment to environmental sustainability.” Shel-Life is a 100% natural emulsion (plant-based) manufactured with natural extracts, lipids and plant polymers that forms a covering on the fruit which allows to reduce the Food Waste, by means of dehydration and the growth of microorganisms. Shel-Life is a product for agribusiness that differs from its competitors since the coatings used by the vast majority of fruit exporting companies in the market consist of synthetic waxes that are made up of components derived from petroleum.
Industry Groups: Agriculture and Farming, Biotechnology, Food and Beverage, Science and Engineering

Full Description: Solar energy is the fastest growing renewable energy in Chile and the world's leading unconventional source. Photovoltaic solar plants need a simple and effective solution to stop the loss of efficiency caused by dirt on the surface of the modules. USD $ 1.8M / year in a 100MWp plant After two months without supervision, a solar panel can generate up to 35% less energy due to the effect of dirt depending on the location and context of the plant. Its cleaning constitutes approximately 40% of the operation and maintenance costs of a photovoltaic plant. This means a great loss of efficiency, therefore money, putting at risk the success of the projects.

Description: Subscription services that allows it's users unlimited access to fitness classes in the best gyms and studios in Latin America.
Full Description: MuvPass is a monthly subscription service that grants its users access to unlimited workouts in the best gyms and fitness studios in the region. ¿Have you ever paid a whole year gym subscription and barely used it? More than 80% of traditional gym subscribers drop their training after four months...Why? Three main factors explain this: (i) it is boring to do the same workout always; (ii) because of inflexible class schedules and; (iii) because of budget. That is why we created MuvPass: A subscription service with which you can train whatever you WANT, wherever you ARE, and whenever you CAN, at a reasonable price. We built the widest fitness network in Chile, and offer our clients plans that allow them to book online, have unlimited workouts, and train in all the associated venues. You can have a yoga class, a gym workout and a crossfit training in the same week… or even in the same day. On the other hand, we pay our venues for each booking we process, resulting in generating marginal income for them while making use of their excess capacity.

Industries: Analytics, Artificial Intelligence, Data Integration, Machine Learning, Predictive Analytics
Description: Powered by AI, Z Data Lab helps companies discover new significant growth opportunities, accelerate revenue and boost their margins
Full Description: Z Data Lab es un motor de Sales & Marketing Analytics basado en AI y Auto-ML, específicamente diseñado para empresas de tamaño mediano en el segmento de consumo masivo y retail.  Su sistema de inteligencia artificial es capaz de consolidar y analizar, de forma autónoma, data interna y externa de la empresa para descubrir nuevas oportunidades de crecimiento y mejorar los márgenes de nuestros clientes. Z Data Lab permite integrar en un solo lugar toda la información relevante: datos internos, información de mercado, análisis de redes sociales, indicadores económicos, clima, entre otros. Una vez que la información ha sido integrada, nuestra “salsa secreta” comienza a trabajar. Nuestra tecnología propietaria de Auto-ML es capaz de tomar la información integrada y, autónomamente, identificar las variables relevantes para cada problema de negocio, testear sus supuestos estadísticos, transformar los datos y seleccionar los mejores algoritmos y predicciones, para luego integrarlas en los sistemas de nuestros clientes y generar acciones comerciales de forma automatizada. El motor de AI de Z Data Lab analiza profundamente la información disponible para generar un modelo unificado del negocio de la empresa y su mercado. Esto permite alinear los objetivos de las diferentes áreas de la compañía y hacer que la operación comercial y de revenue management se vuelva más conectada, eficiente y predecible. La automatización provista por Z Data Lab hace que nuestros clientes puedan liberar recursos técnicos y humanos de las áreas de Analytics y BI y dedicarlos a lo más importante: el análisis de negocio y la definición de la estrategia.  El objetivo de Z Data Lab es simple: mejorar los resultados de nuestros clientes de una forma clara, medible y escalable.
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence, Data and Analytics, Information Technology, Science and Engineering, Software

Description: Decentralized Crowdfunding System
Full Description: Godzillion is a Decentralized Crowdfunding System, where people can vote, fund and exchange global startups on Blockchain. Here, startups can present their project to a community that votes about let them initiate or not a crowdfunding campaign trough Godzillion. In order to be voted, startups put a reward that later will be distributed among all the people that vote on that startup. If the startup is positively voted,  the smart contract architecture creates his Startup Token (SUP), tokens that represent equity of the startup. Once that the crowdfunding campaign starts, investors can participate in the funding process and once that the campaign ends, investors have a startup exchange available where they can buy or sell any SUP that had been funded trough Godzillion System. All the process without commission in the entire platform.

Description: CityHeroes, a web and mobile app, enables individuals to collaboratively report and solve collective issues and threatening situations.
Full Description: CityHeroes is an application for smartphones that enables people to send a report about a particular situation in less than 30 seconds. Either it be a loose wire at the office or a terrorist treat at a public event, the information of such event may help save lives. CityHeroes also provides a web platform where the companies, governments, and organizations can manage the reports in real-time, obtain the exact location of the problem, forward the information to the approrpiate institutions, and ideally find a solution to the problem. In this same form CityHeroes can send alerts to the members of an organization when a particular situation requires rapid and effective communication. CityHeroes is also connected to LifeTag, a series of electronic devices that can be either carried around by people or be installed in buses, homes, and other locations. These devices are independent of the cell-phones and are capable of generating information and immediate alerts in case of critical situations. These devices are connected to the CityHeroes system in order to shorten the response times and enable the institutions to take action in the shortest amount of time possible.

Description: EMcube helps develop 3D coils of different properties by enabling creation of personal designs of different plastic combinations.
Full Description: At this moment 3D printers are becoming cheaper. However, the necessary supplies are still expensive (US$36/kg) and its price doesn't match with the real value (US$5/kg). EMcube is able to make user's personal 3D material from other 3D printings, plastic objects such as bottles, plastic bags, and other plastic-made objects in bulk. We aim to help people developing new 3D coils with different properties by enabling to create personal designs of different plastic combinations . This will increase the posibility of customizing and creating new materials.  Our product is a simple machine which takes a wide range of small pieces of plastic as its printing supply, and extrudes it in order to make plastic coil. It can be used with any generic 3D printer. It's designed to be a modular product; therefore, users can add new modules either obtained from us or personally developed. We support any module modification made by users than significate an upgrade to the machine.

Description: Polisofia is an online platform that allows users to design challenges that are resolved by the community at large using crowdsourcing.
Full Description: Polisofia is an online platform that allows companies, universities, governmental and non-governmental organizations among other actors to design challenges that are resolved by the community at large using the concept of crowd-sourcing.  Polisofia’s value proposal also contemplates the creation of white label branded innovation platforms for individual organizations that are administered and maintained by Polisofia using the concept of SaaS. Thanks to this platform, universities will not only able to create dynamic academic programs by devising internal challenges dealing with different parts of the curriculum but will also be able to allow students and alumni to connect with the public and private sector to solve challenges formulated by these actors. In the private sector, Polisofia allows organizations to discover and reward internal talent to improve processes and design challenges that get their client’s to improve the design and functionality of products. Polisofia can be used in the public sector as a public policy tool, allowing citizens and their representatives in governments to resolve a community’s problem working together. Finally, by using challenges to connect social innovators with NGOs and Social Entrepreneurs, Polisofia creates a new means to accelerate social innovation

Description: Trusted Journeys For Busy Families
Full Description: Aveeza grants parents the ability to connect with our school van drivers through our clever smartphone application for Android and iOS, to ensure their children always have a dedicated lift to and from school, as well as allowing parents to reserve a driver for any other transport needs as required. Once a driver is chosen and accepted, then they are that driver for the child for the rest of the school year, and always making the pickup at their home at the same time in the mornings, and dropping them off at home again after school. Drivers can then supplement their income by providing their services for other transport needs outside of making the school run, like when a parent needs their child picked up from football practice after school, which is all managed by our application. By seamlessly connecting 30,000 drivers ferrying more than 600,000 children twice a day in just Chile alone, with Aveeza, parents can also monitor the location of the vehicle that their child is on, and much more. Aveeza is first-to-market with its technology and idea in Latin America, serving a USD$400 million market in Chile, and a USD$15 billion ecosystem throughout all of Latin America. We are changing the game, and getting kids safely and cheaply to and from school every day, and given we have a maximum of 15 children per vehicle, we're also helping reduce traffic congestion.

Industries: Cloud Computing, File Sharing, Web Hosting
Description: Yoozon hosts dynamic websites from Dropbox.
Full Description: Yoozon offers an innovative way of hosting websites. If you are used to developing, publishing, and maintaining websites for your clients, you probably lose a lot of time setting up servers, FTP, database and the whole environment before you can publish your project. And you have to do that differently for each language you are coding in. That takes away your focus and valuable time, that you should use to focus on what really matters: You creativity and developing skills. Instead of having a hosting plan on a complex and expensive server, having to configure FTP and DB from scratch, and remembering all the different login credentials for each of your clients, you can just upload your files to your Dropbox and that's it. You will have your website up and running using only one platform, hassle-free.
Founders: João Drummond, Pedro Santiago, Thiago Veloso

Description: SonicPollen, based in Chile, is a web-based booking platform that connects bands with venues and organizers.
Full Description: SonicPollen started in 2012 as a booking platform to connect bands with venues and organizers.  We gained a lot of attention from musicians, but not much from organizers.  Recently we went Lean and we discovered that the main need of the organizer is to assure a high attendance.  After many experiments in the last months we've been able to DOUBLE the attendance by developing:  Crowdsourced booking process: fans vote which band plays.  Attendance prediction: We analyze voters and other data to help the organizer book the right band.  Benefits list: Fans can access to benefits if they register to the list through a Facebook account and share the event.  Check-in: Attendees are checked-in through a mobile app when entering the show. This makes possible to generate analytics about how many people attracted each band, among other analytics.  Benefit validation: A mobile app is used to validate the people that has benefits. Now we need to organize our product, explore and validate a business model.
Industry Groups: Events, Media and Entertainment, Music and Audio
Top 5 Investors: Start-Up Chile, California Narcotic Canine Association

Description: Trovali is a platform that empowers you to get your tasks done efficiently, reliably and securely by background-checked Runners.
Full Description: Trovali is a platform that empowers you to get your tasks done efficiently, reliably and securely by background-checked Runners. All you have to do is post a task and a deadline. Within minutes a Trovali Runner will bid on your project. You can choose whichever Runner you want or let us to pick for you. Either way, you can rest easy knowing you got a great deal and the Runner earned a fair wage Trovali’s platform gives Runners the opportunity to make money and helps their neighbors/local businesses get important tasks done. Businesses, expats and families all benefit from access to motivated on-demand labor at a fair price. A family which needs help around the house might enlist the services of a local cleaner. A business may need someone to deliver documents or just do some short term market research. Neither of them will spend hours looking for a solution nor worry about the quality of service. Trovali not only creates efficient ways of getting things done, but it cuts out high costs related to hiring new employees, reduces the need for middlemen, and allows the real service provider, or Runner, to earn a better wage.

Description: Teamcore captures the value from retail POS data and generate Potential Sales opportunities for Consumer Goods comp through AI and tasks
Full Description: Teamcore identifies on-shelf availability and lost sales opportunities for Consumer Products and FMCG companies. It prioritizes automated tasks after processing stores sales, stock, and in-store data on machine learning (ML) algorithms. The platform enables a structured retail execution methodology by creating a problem-solving workflow across the entire retail sales and operations team, empowering consumer product companies to better store execution. Lost sales driven by poor execution at store level can exceed 10% of retail sales. This is the reason why CPG companies want visibility of what is happening in every store, and value-added tasks to fix the main issues

In the newly burgeoning mobile and tablet space, recipe apps have also become popular. Unfortunately, Cook books, online recipes, and many recipe apps fail to create an engaging experience which actually aids in the process of cooking! Do these tools make us better cooks and help us make better meals? Description: Owners and top executives of a company, known as insiders, know better than anyone if the market valuation of their own company stock is
Full Description: Owners and top executives of a company, known as insiders, know better than anyone if the market valuation of their own company stock is the right one. There is evidence that, on average, when they acquire stock from their own company their profits outperform market averages. Thus, investors can make better investment decisions by following insiders’ movements. Insiders Chile monitors in real-time and collects information on transactions made by insiders in the chilean stock market. Based on this information Insiders Chile generates real-time alerts, historical databases and statistics with value added for stocks investors. Clients of Insiders Chile have alerts services and access to databases and transaction statistics customized to user needs.

Industries: Android, Cyber Security, iOS, Linux, macOS, Open Source, Security, Software
Description: Prey is an Anti-Theft software for both personal and business use that allows users to track lost-stolen mobile devices and manage them.
Full Description: Prey is a freemium Web service for tracking & managing laptops, smartphones, and mobile devices on a single online platform. Prey's hidden agent is installed on the device and it then contacts the user’s online panel, delivering location information, status, and access to actions. The application counts with a set of Anti-Theft features, plus device administration tools for Businesses. Some of Prey’s features are: Control Zones (monitoring through geofencing), Mass Actions (large-scale deployment of actions), File Retrieval & Data Wipe. Plus your ally in device recovery: the Missing Reports (periodic evidence on missing devices). Tracking involves a combination of networks, GPS, and Wi-Fi triangulation features for pin-point location. Prey and its services are owned and operated by Prey Inc., a software company with offices in Hong Kong, Chile, and San Francisco. The software features an open-source code and runs on Windows, Mac OS, Linux, Android and iOS. Much of its source code is published on GitHub and can be copied under the GNU General Public License. The server code and default Control Panel code are proprietary.
Industry Groups: Information Technology, Mobile, Platforms, Privacy and Security, Software

Industries: Agriculture, Biotechnology, Energy, Manufacturing, Renewable Energy
Description: Biofiltro is a global company that has developed and patented an innovative, environmentally friendly and sustainable technology for
Full Description: Biofiltro is a global company that has developed and patented an innovative, environmentally friendly and sustainable technology for domestic and industrial wastewater treatment at low cost.  Through a unique process known worldwide as BIDA® System, we are capable of obtaining water suitable for irrigation and other uses without using chemical products and saving up to 80% of the energy used by conventional solutions, without generating any kind of polluting waste. On the contrary, from this process two very valuable byproducts are produced for agricultural and feeding industries, such as organic fertilizers and important sources of protein and amino acids.  With patents in more than 35 countries and more than 100 facilities around the world (New Zealand, Spain, Chile, Mexico, Brazil etc.), we are the only company to offer this innovative system through an attractive technology licensing model.  Our state of the art technology and our sustainable international business model have earned us the Sustainable Wastewater Treatment Technology Award at the 2011 Cleantech Open in Silicon Valley, USA. The Cleantech Open is an international contest where more than 15000 technologies participate annually.
Industry Groups: Agriculture and Farming, Biotechnology, Energy, Manufacturing, Science and Engineering, Sustainability

Description: SharpShark is a Blockchain legal tech for a full-cycle intellectual property management that was so complex in the past
Full Description: We’re promoting a blockchain-powered tool that helps to protect intellectual property — namely, all kinds of public content, — and monitor copyright violations.  How it works Blockchain saves the timestamp and the IPFS saves the content, making the data immutable. On saving, the system delivers a digital certificate that becomes the piece of digital evidence of authorship. If somebody tries to save another writer's content, our AI won't allow them to do it: before saving, it would check the internet for reverse content. When saved, if the protected content gets published with no copyright, there'll be an alert. Also, we resolve blockchain-backed copyright issues.
Industry Groups: Media and Entertainment, Other, Professional Services

Description: Monkey Puzzle Media is an independent film production company that connects Chile with the international filmmaking community by making
Full Description: Monkey Puzzle Media is an independent film production company that connects Chile with the international filmmaking community by making compelling, emotional cinema for global audiences. For 15 years, Monkey Puzzle’s founder, Langdon F. Page, dreamed from his home in Los Angeles of the day when high-speed internet would allow filmmakers to work together regardless of their location. Since the mid-90′s he had felt an irresistible draw to the wild lands and timeless contradictions of the Southern Cone of the Americas. By 2011, the promise of an interconnected global community was finally becoming a reality, and Monkey Puzzle Media was born. The idea to form a production company in Chile with strong connections to the international marketplace captured the imagination of the recently-launched Start-Up Chile initiative, and Monkey Puzzle Media was awarded a $40,000 grant as a Round 2 participant. In it’s first year, 2012, Monkey Puzzle Media has forged strategic alliances with some of Chile’s best filmmaking teams. By bringing together Mr. Page’s experience making films with U.S. producers and directors, combined with the local know-how of Chilean talent, Monkey Puzzle Media can offer U.S. productions a location experience in Chile that has never existed before. On the remote collaboration front, Monkey Puzzle Media successfully edited three documentaries with directors in Los Angeles— a feature for HBO, and two shorts for 20th Century Fox— from it’s base in Santiago. Finally, Monkey Puzzle has been developing a slate of original productions with filmmakers around the world to be shot and/or posted in Chile and released worldwide. For it’s second year, Monkey Puzzle Media is actively working with local private and government entities to improve the film financing environment in Chile. Already tax-free for international productions, it is our hope that 2013 will be the year Chile will begin offering incentives to draw even more film projects to the riches which Chile has to offer.
Industry Groups: Data and Analytics, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Navigation and Mapping, Video

Keteka was founded by two Peace Corps volunteers focused on helping rural and indigenous communities in Panama actually benefit from tourism. Kyle and Jack recognized that there were thousands of local guides and communities that needed, but lacked, direct access to travelers. At the same time, there were millions of travelers searching for off the beaten path experiences, yet lacked an easy way to find and book them. Description: Andes Biotechnologies is a leading nucleic acid-based drug discovery and development company focused on solid tumor cancers.
Full Description: Andes Biotechnologies is a leading nucleic acid-based drug discovery and development company focused on solid tumor cancers. The Company has discovered two novel families of long non-coding RNAs: sense (S-RNA) and antisense (AS-RNA). Both are present in all human cells, are synthesized in the mitochondria and migrate to the nucleus. The proprietary technology developed by Andes Biotechnologies is based on oligonucleotide drugs that target the novel long non-coding regulatory RNAs in tumor cells inducing apoptosis. Andes Biotechnologies has an active investigational new drug (IND) application in the United States and is currently engaged in the clinical development of its lead drug Andes-1537. Andes Biotechnologies is supported by a proven and experienced management team, a robust network of key national and international collaborators in the cancer field, and has an extensive intellectual property portfolio. Andes Biotechnologies was founded in 2008 and is located in Santiago, Chile.
Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Health Care, Mobile, Science and Engineering

Description: Voxpop is a start up that aim to innovate the way of exchanging information joining grassroots journalism and professional journalism
Full Description: VoxPop is a tool created for media outlets willing to create a deeper interaction with their public, engaging them through a question/answer mechanism. We give to journalists the possibility to collect newsworthy material and relevant stories. From everyone. From everywhere. VoxPop step-by-step: - A media creates a short video introducing a topic and question users about it. - The 'video-question' is spread through the media channels. - People involved with the topic can provide a short 'video-answer'. - The video-answers are shown by the media according to different standards. - Media gets the correct geolocation and time of the videos collected. Our goal is to foster grassroots information while providing to the media a way to generate valuable videos without the hassle of verifying location, time and source. VoxPop is a way to refresh an old journalistic practice and adapt it to the new generation of communicators, while fostering job opportunities within newsrooms.
Industry Groups: Content and Publishing, Information Technology, Media and Entertainment, Professional Services

Description: Frontierre is something that is not explored … yet. The last and farthermost limit of knowledge or settlement beyond which lies the vast,
Full Description: Frontierre is something that is not explored … yet. The last and farthermost limit of knowledge or settlement beyond which lies the vast, wild and unknown. Frontierre is the new found land for the first-comers and adventurous. This is what Frontierre is all about- your springboard into new ventures, experiences, friendships and alliances across distances and cultures. Frontierre is the new found land of social eMarket, connecting travellers and Travel and Tourism organisations and powered by the two forces: social network and eMarket. With our family and friends scattered all over the world, we have long dreamt of a consolidated web platform that will make it possible to plan the entire travel, including places to stay and visit, in one go. To get to see and meet local people and explore local tourism opportunities. To share the experiences with our old friends and keep connections with the new ones that we meet on our journeys. To get inspired, and importantly, to connect to service providers directly to get better deals surpassing the intermediaries and language barriers. Equally the T&T industry is seeking to improve and increase direct contact with their customers, as well as direct booking and marketing. To streamline their information and channel it towards their guests, uplift and maintain customer loyalty and satisfaction. Reach out to new audiences. Ultimately- to get closer and more social with travellers. On Frontierre travellers and T&T organisations and businesses are equals in their social interaction with each other, pursuing the common goal of discovering and providing better, unique travel deals and opportunities. The vision is to have all sorts of T&T organisations onboard – national tourism organisations and consulates, hotels, B&Bs and hostels, restaurants and cafes, museums and clubs, local guides and global travel guide services and databases interacting casually and socially with various travellers. Frontierre is all about direct information sharing and connectivity in the pursuit of global travelling and tourism.

Description: Safehis is a company created to provide innovation in the health market.
Full Description: Safehis is a company created to provide innovation in the health market. Our solutions stand apart because they’re focused on enhancing the intelligence of clinical processes, particularly in complex scenarios such as ICUs. An interdisciplinary team of medical doctors, pharmacists, other medical professionals as well as computer scientists has developed a system capable of having high positive impacts in the security, quality, efficiency, savings, control and management of complex clinical processes.  Safehis helps medical professionals manage the clinical evolution of patients using best practices developed internationally and applied in medical institutions of excellence. It coordinates the pharmacotherapy cycle starting from the e-prescription, through pharmaceutical checking and validation, dispensation (including automated dispensation), reception at the medical unit, and administration. The solution helps to dramatically reduce the possibility of errors at each step of the pharmacotherapy cycle, improves the quality of attention, increases the efficiency of the process and optimises the use and control of resources.

Description: TOC is an identity verification and biometric signature company.
Full Description: TOC is an identity verification and biometric signature company.  They work without enrollment or a database, by linking the fingerprint directly with the biometric information contained in the National Identity Card or Smartphone.  Their patented TOC Trusted 3rd Party (TT3) model which functions through TOC Cloud creates a unique token for every transaction.  No database means Privacy and Security: There is nothing to steal and there are no mistakes. The match is a direct 1:1 connection between my finger and the Smartphone/Tablet/ID card.

The Company employs a total of 160 employees. 6) Omnichannel strategy: Cuponatic pivot many times and is now focusing on its omnichannel strategy based on Inventory expansion, off-line pick-up centers, imports and logistics improvement. 7) Favorable industry & market conditions: Cuponatic operates in stable emerging markets, characterized by a booming middle-class with increasing revenues and a deeper and wider access to internet, mainly through mobile devices.

Industries: Advertising, Android, Information Technology, iOS, Location Based Services, Messaging, Mobile, Mobile Apps, Retail, Software
Description: Mobile application and platform that enables brands to send highly accurate & contextualized messages to users using geolocation
Full Description: The izit solution has been designed to enable brands and retailers to take advantage of contextual mobile marketing channel without having to build their own application or a separate geo-referencing platform. The advantage of the izit is that it combines both promotion and loyalty in the same application and gives users the distinct benefit of receiving geo-referenced promotions from multiple brands without having to download a brand specific application. The integrated loyalty feature enhances the promotion feature by rewarding users through the collection of virtual tokens called “bananas” which can be redeemed for actual products and services. The bananas are planted virtually in the world and are found at different times and quantities, creating a gaming experience similar to Pokemon GO, but with real benefits which can be redeemed directly in on our In-App banana store. This interactive process of collecting bananas in the world and redeeming actual products is different from traditional loyalty programs in which the consumer needs to purchase an item before they receive benefits.  In izit’s case, the user collects bananas in the world and is able to redeem them for products without an initial purchase. This difference creates a similar effect as an in-store promoter who gives you a sample to try for free with the intent of generating interest in the product and ultimately a sale. This same process now can be done virtually for any product through izit. From a Brand or retailer perspective, izit is a platform that can now be used to improve the shopping experience for their clients before, during and after their store visit. Izit addresses the challenges of delivering promotions at the point of sale, of attracting a critical mass of users, and delivering instant value while the user is physically shopping. Based on recent campaigns, izit has delivered an average Return on Investment (ROI) of 75% to a leading client using this channel.  In principal, the contextual mobile channel should be considered as a complimentary and natural extension of Social and Search to enhance the customer journey. Although similar to these channels, contextual marketing is also distinct in that the messages sent are generally executed through push notifications and by combining this with geo-referencing technology, contextual marketing enables brands to efficiently control what is published to their clients at the precise moment they are near or in the store. Since launching in 2013, izit has executed over 5,100 campaigns and have sent more than 125 million messages. Our results closely confirm industry findings and forecasts related to this channel and it is effectiveness when messages are delivered contextually. On average, izit achieves an industry leading mobile click-thru-rate (CTR) of 30% across most campaigns and true or Point of Sale conversions between 5 and 10% depending on the brand category. The use of the izit channel is beneficial to the brands by helping to enhance branding, accelerate purchases and to generate in-store leads. Izit has recently been awarded a research grant on Artificial Intelligence and is currently participating in other contextual marketing research in collaboration with researchers at the University of Chile, California, and Maryland.  The izit solution consists of a front-end smartphone application that has been designed to work on Android and IOS mobile platforms. The backend technology consists of a series of applications to manage, publish, and track promotions as they are published in established geo-fences. The izit platform is hosted on the Amazon Web Service (AWS) cloud and has been architected to be fully scalable with the goal to expand to other countries. A new version of izit is scheduled to be released at the end of this year and will include a direct payment feature in which users will be able to make direct purchases of promotions, saving time and further improving the experience for izit users. Izit currently has a patent filed related to our geolocation technology in Chile (No. 2013-01957) in September 2017 and have patent pending applications in Brazil and US.
Industry Groups: Advertising, Apps, Commerce and Shopping, Data and Analytics, Information Technology, Internet Services, Messaging and Telecommunications, Mobile, Navigation and Mapping, Platforms, Sales and Marketing, Software
Founders: Koichi Arimitsu, Marcos Almendras Riesco, Roberto Musso

Description: La Polar is the retail marketing of household products, clothing, accessories for men, women and children.
Full Description: La Polar is founded in 1920 as a tailor in what is now known as Estacion Central, in 1953 becomes a store of multiple products with the name of La Polar. By the late 1980s, following the trend of other companies like Falabella, Paris and Ripley La Polar begins its expansion to become a local department store chain. Thus, between 1985 and 1986 opened its first stores in downtown Santiago (San Diego and Monjitas). In 1989 they enter the lending business to get their credit card for purchases at the chain. The company began its expansion in Santiago and other regions over the next decade, reaching 12 stores in 1998, with an area of 24,100 sqm and 350,000 customers of their credit cards. In 2003, the company initiates the transaction of its shares on the Santiago Stock Exchange in 2007; La Polar changes its brand image and begins to participate in malls after an alliance with Mall Plaza. Since 2010, La Polar totals 38 stores and an area of 160,000 sqm. Currently La Polar has 38 stores in Chile one of the leading companies in the retail sector in Chile, being the fourth player in the industry, with a market share around 10%.

Description: CMPC, a forestry company, produces, markets, sells, and exports wood products, pulp, paper, and tissue products.
Full Description: CMPC, a forestry company, produces, markets, sells, and exports wood products, pulp, paper, and tissue products in Chile and internationally. It operates through Pulp, Packaging, and Softys segments.  The Pulp segment produces and markets pulp and wood products. It offers pulpwood logs, sawn pulpwood, sawn timber, refabricated wood, plywood board, long pulp fiber, and short pulp fiber. This segment also owns approximately 648,000 hectares of forest plantations primarily comprising pine and eucalyptus, including 452,000 hectares in Chile; 138,000 hectares in Brazil; and 58,000 hectares in Argentina, as well as operates a biomass electric energy production plant located in Nacimiento.  The Packaging segment offers cardboard, corrugated paper, corrugated cardboard boxes, bags or industrial sacks, and molded pulp trays; and distributes and recycles paper. The Softys segment produces and sells tissue product comprising toilet paper, paper towels, paper napkins, and facial tissues; sanitary products, such as baby diapers, wipes, adult diapers, and sanitary napkins; and specialized hygiene products for consumption in institutions and public places.  This segment sells its products under the Elite, Confort, Nova, Higienol, Sussex, Babysec, Cotidian, and Ladysoft brands. CMPC began operation on February 5, 1920, with its headquarters in Santiago in Chile.
Industry Groups: Administrative Services, Manufacturing, Sales and Marketing

Description: FAMAE is a Chilean state-owned firearms manufacturer.
Full Description: FAMAE is the company of military products in Chile, sustainer of the needs of national defense for more than two centuries and a pioneer in the development of advanced technologies in products and services, both military and civilian use. All this has made FAMAE an important asset for economic and social development. Since 1811, it is the oldest defense company in Latin America. FAMAE specializes in research projects and Weapon System Modernization. Its prestige lies in the expertise of its 208 years of existence, consolidated path through serious work and grounded in trained and specialized human resources. Also, the quality of its products, the result of processes certified under the international standard ISO 9001, and its constant adaptation to new scenarios, where research, innovation and development are part of the strategic objectives of this defense company. These features allow FAMAE offer a wide range of products and services, which mainly rely on the maintenance of weapons systems, aimed at sustaining the battleship material. For this Factories and Arsenals of the Army has five Industrial Maintenance Centers throughout the country: Arica, Pozo Almonte, Antofagasta, Talagante and Punta Arenas. Also, it has an extensive portfolio of products developed and manufactured, highlighting smaller caliber weapons, submachine guns and assault rifles for tactical use, as well as all maintenance thereof. Similarly, production has less ammunition, demilitarized and recovery more ammunition, manufacturing and certification service life extension of rockets and missiles. That is, it has extensive capabilities to suit the needs and requirements of its customers. All these features allow FAMAE now become a benchmark in Chile and Latin America as a supplier of defense products and services based on high standard processes and innovation and technology weapons systems.

Full Description: A social media company, helping Latin American businesses connect with consumers worldwide through a multi-language directory & travelguides. CityVoz, Latin America's multilanguage directory, was founded in Santiago, Chile in 2011. Entreprenuer Francisco Poblete moved back to Chile and quickly realized after trying to find a place to live that it was almost impossible to find local business information on the web. Most businesses in Chile do not have a website presence and the local directories are only in Spanish. So CityVoz was founded with the intention of helping local business owners promote their services in a multilanguage directory and to allow locals and travelers to find places and share their personal experiences.

Central Bank of Chile is an independent public sector institution in charge of conducting monetary policy.
Full Description: The Central Bank of Chile was created on 22 August 1925, under the government of Arturo Alessandri Palma. Since 10 October 1989, the Central Bank of Chile is an autonomous entity of technical nature, and has as its purposes to look after the stability of the currency, that is, to keep inflation low and stable over time. The Bank must also promote the stability and efficacy of the financial system and the normal functioning of internal and external payment systems, to generate a predictable environment for decision making of economic agents contributing to reduce the ups and downs of the economic cycles, thus providing a solid basis for the country´s permanent growth. For these purposes, the powers of the Bank include that of regulating the amount of currency and credit in circulation in order to provide an adequate stock of money for individuals, firms and institutions and thus assure their transactions. The Central Bank of Chile´s main institutional building is located at 1180 Agustinas St. downtown, Santiago.

Description: IAM is providing the services of catchment of raw water, the production, transportation and distribution of water.
Full Description: Inversiones Aguas Metropolitanas, IAM, holds 50.1% of the share capital of Aguas Andinas and subsidiaries, the largest sanitation group in Chile and one of the largest private companies in the sector in Latin America. IAM’s sanitation subsidiaries provide the services of catchment of raw water, the production, transportation and distribution of water, and the collection, treatment and final disposal of sewage, to a universe of approximately 8 million people in the Metropolitan, De Los Lagos and De Los Ríos Regions. Its concession areas in Chile’s central valley cover 71 thousand hectares, and 13 thousand hectares in the provinces of Valdivia, Ranco, Llanquihue, Chiloé and Palena in the south of the country. IAM’s sanitation subsidiaries Aguas Andinas, Aguas Cordillera, Aguas Manquehue and ESSAL provide high levels of coverage, similar to those of developed nations: 100% in water supply, 98% in sewage and 100% in sewage treatment. The non-sanitation subsidiaries EcoRiles, Gestión y Servicios, Anam and Aguas del Maipo provide an integral management in the sanitation industry through services related to the treatment of industrial waste, the sale of equipment, laboratory analysis and the development of energy projects relating to sanitation companies, respectively.

Description: SlidePick is a mobile application that provides an easy and agile way to sort your photo mess. Soon your videos, music, files and much more.
Full Description: How many times you have promised yourself to sit down an afternoon to organize all those photos from your vacation trip? SlidePick is born as a solution to this false promise. We were inspired by the form and structure that our brain use to organize and distribute the constant flow of information that we receive every day. We rely on research and interviews with neuroscientists who have been in the process of mentoring the project. From this, we have created a unique technology which end with the mess of our photos, and in a near future the caos of all kind of contents like videos, music, files, contacts, etc. In an intuitive, agile and easy way. Today SlidePick simplifies and streamlines the process of organizing, managing, and deleting of your photos stored on your mobile devices, cloud services, web and social networks through a simple gesture classification system (swipe to pick) which optimizes the time and place to perform this tedious work. SlidePick solves this problem in a simple and agile way from the comfort of your Smartphone.
Industry Groups: Content and Publishing, Media and Entertainment, Mobile, Platforms, Software
Founders: Esteban Bocic, Matias Honorato, Stefano Fenzo

Description: CSAV  is a Chilean shipping company.
Full Description: Compañía Sudamericana de Vapores (CSAV) is a Chilean shipping company. Founded in 1872, it is one of the oldest shipping companies in the world and, currently, one of the largest in Latin America. CSAV is a corporation that has been listed on the stock market since 1893. The company offers transportation services, such as the maritime carriage of liquid and solid bulk cargoes, refrigerated cargo, cars and heavy equipment. ​ Quiñenco, the Luksic family’s holding, became part of the ownership of CSAV in 2011 and, after a capital increase in February 2012, the group became the legal comptroller of the company, currently with 54.5% of the ownership. Quiñenco is one of the most important conglomerates in Chile, with consolidated assets over US$57 billion. It controls an important number of leading companies, such as Banco de Chile, CCU, Invexans, Madeco, SM SAAM and Enex (licensee of Shell in Chile).

Gamelogic was founded in 2013 and is based in Johannesburg, South Africa.

Description: ENAP is engaged in the exploration, production, refining, and marketing of hydrocarbons and their derivatives.
Full Description: Empresa Nacional del Petróleo (ENAP) is a public company owned by the State of Chile. ENAP’s main line of business is the exploration, production, refining and marketing of hydrocarbons and their by-products. It was created by Organic Law No. 9,618 of Empresa Nacional del Petróleo, dated June 19, 1950. It operates as a commercial company, under a public law juridical regime and is autonomously managed. ENAP participates in the exploration and production of hydrocarbons through its subsidiary Enap Sipetrol S.A. and in the refining, transportation, storage, and marketing of petroleum-based products through Enap Refinerías S.A. ENAP carries out its activities and operations in five countries: Chile, Argentina and Egypt. The Head Office is located in Santiago, Chile.

Description: Blockchain & Fintech | Seguridad de datos para Empresas | Desarrollo de Plataformas Empresariales
Full Description: NBITEK, es una empresa de Tecnologías de la Información con orientación en sistemas de seguridad que opera en más de 7 países de Latinoamérica y que pretende dar respuesta a los exigentes requerimientos del mercado.  Somos un Proveedor-Partner de nuestros clientes en donde los productos se acompañen de servicios de calidad entregado por personal calificado y certificado.    Nbitek ya cuenta con un respaldo en el mercado latinoamericano, especializándose en ofrecer productos y servicios globales para ambientes exigentes y altamente demandantes de tecnología. Description: Wolfenson es un estudio jurídico integral, fundado por abogados dedicados a brindar asesoría legal y representación jurídica de excelencia.
Full Description: Estudio Jurídico Chile. Wolfenson Abogados es un estudio jurídico integral, enfocado en brindar una asesoría jurídica y representación legal de excelencia a personas, familias y empresas en las principales áreas del derecho. Derecho civil, derecho laboral, derecho de familia, derecho penal, derecho constitucional, derecho corporativo, entre otras materias.  Nuestro enfoque se manifiesta mediante un sistema de comunicación continua y oportuna con nuestros clientes y asesoramiento legal ajustado a sus requerimientos. Cuestión que permite tomar decisiones informadas, con perspectiva global y en concordancia con los principios que inspiran su negocio, generando extraordinarios resultados. Somos abogados líderes en pensamiento, integridad y colaboración. Nuestra óptica esta dirigida a resolver asuntos legales sofisticados pero también cotidianos, entregando el más alto compromiso en cada paso que damos junto a nuestros clientes. Brindando las mejores soluciones y estrategias legales para personas, familias y empresas. Nuestro método se sustenta en la confianza que depositan nuestros clientes en la firma Wolfenson, lo cual sumado a una comunicación cercana y directa, nos permite otorgar una defensa jurídica con énfasis en la calidad. La especialización legal, así como la integral formación en derecho de cada uno de los abogados de la firma, permite comprender y acercarse a los asuntos y problemáticas de la profesión, con la profundidad requerida para brindar excelencia. Entre las principales materias que conforman nuestra práctica legal, se encuentran las siguientes: 1.- Derecho Constitucional: Recursos de Protección, Recursos de Amparo, Recursos ante la Corte Interamericana de Derechos Humanos, Acciones ante el Tribunal Constitucional de Chile. Entre otras. 2.- Derecho Civil: Redacción de Documentos y Contratos, Mediación y Prevención de Conflictos, Representación y Litigación Judicial, Herencias y Sucesiones, Estudio de Títulos, Ejecución de Títulos de Crédito, Juicios de Arrendamiento​​Responsabilidad Civil e Indemnización de Perjuicios, Asesoría Inmobiliaria​​, Derecho del Consumidor y Publicidad​​, Accidentes de Tránsito, Tenencia Responsable de Mascotas​​​, Defensa ante Embargo de Bienes. Entre otras. 3.- Derecho Penal: Delitos contra la Propiedad, Delitos contra la Integridad, Delitos contra la Honra, Delitos Sexuales, Delitos Económicos y Tributarios, Compliance y Anticorrupción, Entre otros.​​ 4.- Derecho de Familia: Divorcio Mutuo Acuerdo, Unilateral o Culposo, Mediación y Prevención de Conflictos, Separación Judicial y Bien Familiar, Pensión de Alimentos, Aumento y Disminución, Relación Directa y Regular, Régimen de Visitas, Cambio de Nombre, Violencia Intrafamiliar (VIF), Cuidado Personal sobre Menores, Entre otras. 5.- Derecho Público: Asesoría a Funcionarios Públicos, Libre Competencia, Representación y Litigación contra el Fisco y Órganos de la Administración del Estado, Derecho Ambiental, Sanciones Administrativas e Impugnación de Resoluciones, Contratación Pública, Entre otras. 6.- Derecho Corporativo: Redacción de Documentos y Contratos, Mediación y Solución Alternativa de Conflictos, Litigación Judicial y Resolución de Controversias, Asesoría y Planificación Tributaria, Fusiones y Adquisiciones, Compliance y Gobiernos Corporativos, Asesoría Laboral para Empresas, ​Constitución, Modificación y Disolución de Empresas, Propiedad Intelectual y Registro de Marcas, Due Diligence en Derechos Humanos, Derecho del Consumo y Publicidad, Asesoría Inmobiliaria, Insolvencia, Reorganización y Liquidación de la Empresa Deudora, Entre otras. 7.- Derecho Laboral: Despido Injustificado, Despido Indirecto o Autodespido, Reclamaciones de Multas, Desafueros Laborales​, Tutela de Derechos Fundamentales, Acoso Laboral, Accidentes de Trabajo, Entre otras. ​ Wolfenson Abogados. Estudio Jurídico Chile.  Con foco en lo más importante, nuestros clientes. Palabras Clave: Abogado, Abogados, Abogado en Santiago, Abogados en Santiago, Abogados en Chile, Asesoría Legal, Asesoría Legal en Santiago, Abogado de Familia, Abogado Gratis, Abogado Penalista, Abogado Constitucionalista, Defensa judicial, Abogados Civiles, Abogados de Familia, Abogado, Abogado de Divorcio, Abogados de Divorcios, Abogado de Familia Gratis, Abogados de Familia en Santiago, Asesoría Legal gratuita, Asesoría Inmobiliaria, Abogados de Chile, Wolfenson, Estudio Jurídico de Familia, Estudio de Abogados, Estudio Jurídico en Santiago, Wolfenson Abogados.

AmnesiaGames is a software team creating games and applications mainly for mobile devices.
Full Description: AmnesiaGames is a Chilean company which makes games and apps for mobile platforms. It´s headquarters are in Santiago , Chile. Around 13 people work there, mainly game developers and artists. History AmnesiaGames was founded in 2006 by Alejandro Woywood and some of his students from his course “game creation” of the Universidad Católica.  In the beginning, games were made for mobile telephones (using J2ME, SMS and WML technologies).  Back than the company decided to make games in a work-for-hire sheme, making games and apps for clients such as McDonalds, Advertising Agencies, Mobile Operatores, etc. ,  securing a regular income that allowed the company to grow safe and steadly. AmnesiaGames´ big break came in 2010, in a regional contest by Nokia, where AmnesiaGames resulted in being winners. This is the point where they began making their own games and publishing them. They also created and administrated the mobile portal of ENTEL PCS and CLARO from 2007 to 2012. Nowadays they create games and promotional apps. Competence AmnesiaGames´ strong point is their ability to make multiplatform 2D games. They programmed games for almost all mobile platforms: iOS, Android, Windows Phone, Flash, HTML5, NgCore, Qt, J2ME and Bada. AmnesiaGames developed a multiplatform engine that allows to target multiple platforms with the same code base. This means that the game development process ends with a compatible version for 6 to 8 platforms in the same time that another single platform engine makes only 1 version. There is of course some overhead (testing, QA, art) for every additional platform, but the programming is the same.  Games 31 Minutos (iOS and Andoid) World of Doodles (Facebook) Ninja Joe ( iOS, Android, Windows Phone and Windows) Ciudad McDonald’s (Symbian) Ninja Joe Undercover (Symbian) Balloon Buster (Symbian) Ninja Joe (J2ME) Combate Politico (J2ME) Shooting Range Simulator (C++,) And other games.

Hemos definido dar un valor agregado en la crianza con calidad  de vida, para que su producto sea natural y sin alteraciones en su ciclo de producción. Equipo técnico compuesto por ingeniera comercial Mba con experiencia en dirigir empresa y proyectos de investigación, ingeniero agrónomo con experiencia en SAG, fiscalización y exportaciones y administrador turístico con experiencia en manejo de granjas en país agro-ganadero.

Full Description: We are a biotechnology company dedicated to creating technology for the cultivation and commercialization of microalgae. The proposed of the company is the transformation of the food industry in the world. Thus, an investigation on spirulina and its cultivation methods around the world emerges, concluding that traditional cultivation methods used a lot of water and required extraordinarily specific conditions for its cultivation. This conclusion gives us a route, and this was the creation of a technology that would allow us to improve efficiency and improve the current production methods of spirulina, with the vision that in the future many people could benefit from the consumption of this superfood, considered by many, the food of the future. We hope continuing in the investigation of others microalgaes to make the same work that in this moment we are making with the spiruline

Through its subsidiary Rio de Janeiro Refrescos Ltda, Embotelladora Andina SA produces and distributes alcoholic and nonalcoholic drinks, mineral water, juices, syrups and powdered drinks in the Brazilian territory; and through Embotelladora del Atlantico SA, the Company manufactures, bottles and distributes Coca-Cola soft drinks in the Argentine territory. The Company owns fully consolidated subsidiaries, such as Andina Bottling Investments SA, Abisa Corp SA, Servicios Multivending Ltda, Transportes Andina Refrescos Ltda and Embotelladora Andina Chile SA, among others. On October 11, 2013, its subsidiary, Rio de Janeiro Refrescos Ltda, acquired a 100% stake in Companhia de Bebidas Ipiranga.

Description: We would like to preserve the environment in a cool and fun way
Full Description: We would like to preserve the environment in a cool and fun way. Our mission at Muvter is to provide eco-friendly alternatives to today’s energy-depleting, environment-threatening norms. We don’t want to accomplish the mission relying on charities or government subsides. Description: ENAER is in manufacturing technology and aviation maintenance.
Full Description: In 1930 a Maintenance Wing is created by the Chilean Air Force and 54 years later, on March 16, 1984 began his operations ENAER, EMPRESA NACIONAL DE AERONAÚTICA DE CHILE. At its beginning, the role of the Air Force of Chile was important to provide economical resources, facilities and personnel. With the creation of ENAER was intended to encourage the repairing capacity of aircrafts , engines and components in Chile, counteracting the restrictions on access to existing foreign markets at these time and to develop manners to absorb the heavy burden rise up from the complexity of depot maintenance specialization, product of technological advance. Today, with over 80 years of experience in the field of aviation, ENAER is one of the most important aeronautical maintenance centers in Latin America. Description: ALMA is a revolutionary astronomical interferometer, comprising an array of 66 giant radio telescopes.
Full Description: The Atacama Large Millimeter/submillimeter Array (ALMA) is a revolutionary instrument in its scientific concept, its engineering design, and its organization as a global scientific endeavor... Currently under construction in the thin, dry air of northern Chile's Atacama desert at an altitude of 5,000 meters above sea level, ALMA will initially be composed of 66 high-precision antennas working together at millimeter and submillimeter wavelengths, with a possible extension in the future. Thanks to its high resolution and sensitivity, ALMA will open an entirely new "window" on the Universe, allowing scientists to unravel longstanding and important astronomical mysteries, in search of our Cosmic Origins. Some people say that the sun never sets on ALMA. Indeed, ALMA is a wonderful example of a worldwide collaboration , involving partners from four continents. By working together, scientists and engineers from around the world tackle unprecedented challenges and will seek to expand the frontiers of knowledge. ALMA is expected to begin science operations with a limited number of antennas and to start full science operations with 66 antennas. Scientists from around the world will thus soon employ this remarkable facility to probe the very first stars and galaxies, and directly image exo-planets, possibly discovering the first traces of life.

It offers large volume parenteral (LVP)solutions, such as electrolytes, dextrose, sodium bicarbonate, lactated ringer, plasmatic expanders, osmotic diuretics, and solutions for peritoneal dialysis; and small volume parenteral (SVP) solutions, such as antibiotics, analgesics, narcotic-analgesics, anti-inflammatories, anesthetics, tranquilizers, anticoagulants, hypnotics, corticoids, and hormones, as well as antianxiety agents/amnestics/anticonvulsants, antihistamines, and neuromuscular blocking agents. The company’s SVP solutions also include corticosteroids, diuretics, cardiac glycosides, dextrose and vitamin therapy, calcium supplements, anti-arrhythmics/antihypertensives, adrenergics, inotropic agents, coronary vasodilators, antispasmodics/anticholinergics, antimyasthenics, antiemetics, antiasthmatics/bronchodilators, uterine relaxants, electrolyte replenishers, oxitocics, antihemorrhagic products, antibacterials, antipsychoticsanabolic steroids, and alkalizers.

We provide water purification systems with low O&M and fast installation for remote communities with limited access to potable water.
Full Description: Typical water purification systems are designed to operate with fixed water conditions, but quality source might vary (i.e. winter vs summer). In addition, some sources might not be available in scarce periods, forcing users to change sources. Our technology can adapt to different water sources in order to purify.    Energy is the largest operational cost to purify salty water with reverse osmosis membranes. Integrating the latest solar technology with Artificial Intelligence (AI), our systems optimizes in real-time to use the most of the free solar energy. A lot of systems fail because of a lack of maintenance. Our technology allows autonomous operation and remote control. Thanks to our predictive self-cleaning, automatic adjustment to the available solar power, and remote control, we keep the system with the least physical maintenance possible. Water purification projects such us constructing a new schools in rural area, providing water for disaster & relief locations, increasing agriculture production when in need, and others, might need financing. Since every country has its own financing sources, Remote Waters offers support and advice to applying for national and international financial sources.
